preview.label: Enable Preview Mode
preview.comment: Enabled Preview mode. In this case recommendation boxes are only visible if there is a special ?gr_reco_test=true parameter in the url. E.g.: http://example.com/example-product.html?gr_reco_test=true

api_user.label: API Username
api_user.comment: API user name in Gravity system.

enabled_js.label: Enable Custom Gravity Javascript
enabled_js.comment: Please select YES, if you want to edit or customize the extension's main Gravity javascript.

custom_js.label: Custom Gravity Javascript
custom_js.comment: Important! Here you can edit the main Gravity javascript. You have to replace the two occurrence of the "magento" string in your custom javascript with the API username above!

template.label: Use Garvity Template
template.comment: General display setting. If YES all boxes will use Gravity template.

bulk.label: Enable Bulk Recommendation
bulk.comment: General recommendation setting. If YES bulk recommendation will be enabled.

catalog_path.label: Catalog Export File Path
catalog_path.comment: Path where catalog export file will be saved. Example: "gravity_reco/" (path must be writeable)

all.label: Enable All Products Export
all.comment: Enable all products to export. Otherwise please select NO and set the maximum number. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

max.label: Maximum Products Export
max.comment: The maximum number of products to be exported. This number must be between 1 and 1000.

description_enabled.label: Enable Products Description in Export
description_enabled.comment: Please select YES, if you want to add product's description attribute to the catalog export.

additional.label: Additional Attributes
additional.comment: Select additional attributes for catalog export.

only_salable.label: Only Salable
only_salable.comment: In this case only those products will be exported which quantity higher than zero(is in stock). If your store doesn't use stock management choose YES.

status.label: Export Disabled Products
status.comment: Please select YES, if you want to add products with disabled status to the catalog export.

catalog_cron.label: Enable Scheduled Export
catalog_cron.comment: Enable scheduled export job bby cron. Note: you must configure your server to run cron jobs.

catalog_cron_time.label: Start Time
catalog_cron_time.comment: Daily start time for automatic catalog export via cron job.

catalog.label: Export Product Catalog
catalog.comment: This will export product catalog and save in xml file. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

all.label: Enable All Customers Export
all.comment: Enable all customer to export. Otherwise please select NO and set the maximum number. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

max.label: Maximum Customers Export
max.comment: The maximum number of customers to be exported. This number must be between 1 and 1000.

additional.label: Additional Attributes
additional.comment: Select additional attributes for customer export.

customer.label: Export Customers
customer.comment: This will export customers. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

pages.label: Enabled Pages
pages.comment: Pages on general layout recommendation boxes enabled.

best_box.label: Enable Personal Best Box
best_box.comment: Enable "Recommended for you" box on general page views.

best_box_layout.label: Personal Best Box Layout
best_box_layout.comment: Select where "Recommended for you" box should be shown on general page views.

best_box_title.label: Personal Best Box Title
best_box_title.comment: "Recommended for you" box title on general page views.

best_box_limit.label: Personal Best Box Product Count
best_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Recommended for you" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 10.

best_box_columns.label: Personal Best Box Columns
best_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Recommended for you" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

history_box.label: Enable History Box
history_box.comment: Enable "You viewed" box on general page views.

history_box_layout.label: History Box Layout
history_box_layout.comment: Select where "You viewed" box should be shown on general page views.

history_box_title.label: History Box Title
history_box_title.comment: "You viewed" box title on general page views.

history_box_limit.label: History Box Product Count
history_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "You viewed" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 10.

history_box_columns.label: History Box Columns
history_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "You viewed" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

others_box.label: Enable Currently Viewed Box
others_box.comment: Enable "Others are looking at right now" box on general page views.

others_box_layout.label: Currently Viewed Box Layout
others_box_layout.comment: Select where "Others are looking at right now" box should be shown on general page views.

others_box_title.label: Currently Viewed Box Title
others_box_title.comment: "Others are looking at right now" box title on general page views.

others_box_limit.label: Currently Viewed Box Product Count
others_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Others are looking at right now" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 10.

others_box_columns.label: Currently Viewed Box Columns
others_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Others are looking at right now" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

popular_box.label: Enable Popular Box
popular_box.comment: Enable "Top products" box on general page views.

popular_box_layout.label: Popular Box Layout
popular_box_layout.comment: Select where "Top products" box should be shown on general page views.

popular_box_title.label: Popular Box Title
popular_box_title.comment: "Top products" box title on general page views.

popular_box_limit.label: Popular Box Product Count
popular_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Top products" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 10.

popular_box_columns.label: Popular Box Columns
popular_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Top products" box on general page views. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

similar_box.label: Enable Similar Box
similar_box.comment: Enable "You might also like" box on product page view.

similar_box_layout.label: Similar Box Layout
similar_box_layout.comment: Select where "You might also like" box should be shown on product page view.

similar_box_title.label: Similar Box Title
similar_box_title.comment: "You might also like" box title on product page view.

similar_box_limit.label: Similar Box Product Count
similar_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "You might also like" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

similar_box_columns.label: Similar Box Columns
similar_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "You might also like" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

personal_box.label: Enable Personal Box
personal_box.comment: Enable "Recommended for you" box on product page view.

personal_box_layout.label: Personal Box Layout
personal_box_layout.comment: Select where "Recommended for you" box should be shown on product page view.

personal_box_title.label: Personal Box Title
personal_box_title.comment: "Recommended for you" box title on product page view.

personal_box_limit.label: Personal Box Product Count
personal_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Recommended for you" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

personal_box_columns.label: Personal Box Columns
personal_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Recommended for you" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

accessories_box.label: Enable Accessories Box
accessories_box.comment: Enable "You might also need" box on product page view.

accessories_box_layout.label: Accessories Box Layout
accessories_box_layout.comment: Select where "You might also need" box should be shown on product page view.

accessories_box_title.label: Accessories Box Title
accessories_box_title.comment: "You might also need" box title on product page view.

accessories_box_limit.label: Accessories Box Product Count
accessories_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "You might also need" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

accessories_box_columns.label: Accessories Box Columns
accessories_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "You might also need" box on product page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

personal_box.label: Enable Personal Box
personal_box.comment: Enable "Recommended for you" box on category page view.

personal_box_layout.label: Personal Box Layout
personal_box_layout.comment: Select where "Recommended for you" box should be shown on category page view.

personal_box_title.label: Personal Box Title
personal_box_title.comment: "Recommended for you" box title on category page view.

personal_box_limit.label: Personal Box Product Count
personal_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Recommended for you" box on category page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

personal_box_columns.label: Personal Box Columns
personal_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Recommended for you" box on category page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

top_box.label: Enable Top Box
top_box.comment: Enable "Top products" box on category page view.

top_box_layout.label: Top Box Layout
top_box_layout.comment: Select where "Top products" box should be shown on category page view.

top_box_title.label: Top Box Title
top_box_title.comment: "Top products" box title on category page view.

top_box_limit.label: Top Box Product Count
top_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Top products" box on category page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

top_box_columns.label: Top Box Columns
top_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Top products" box on category page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

search_box.label: Enable Recommendation Box
search_box.comment: Enable "Recommended for you" box on search result page view.

search_box_layout.label: Recommendation Box Layout
search_box_layout.comment: Select where "Recommended for you" box should be shown on search result page view.

search_box_title.label: Recommendation Box Title
search_box_title.comment: "Recommended for you" box title on search result page view.

search_box_limit.label: Recommendation Box Product Count
search_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Recommended for you" box on search result page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

search_box_columns.label: Recommendation Box Columns
search_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Recommended for you" box on search result page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

cart_box.label: Enable Cart Box
cart_box.comment: Enable "Others also bought" box on cart page view.

cart_box_layout.label: Cart Box Layout
cart_box_layout.comment: Select where "Others also bought" box should be shown on cart page view.

cart_box_title.label: Cart Box Title
cart_box_title.comment: "Others also bought" box title on cart page view.

cart_box_limit.label: Cart Box Product Count
cart_box_limit.comment: Number of items show in "Others also bought" box on cart page view. This number must be between 1 and 10.

cart_box_columns.label: Cart Box Columns
cart_box_columns.comment: Columns count in "Others also bought" box on cart page view. This number must be between 1 and 6. It has no effect if box is in sidebar.

customer_update.label: Enable Gravity Customer Update
customer_update.comment: If customer is saved in backend it will be updated in Gravity.

product_update.label: Enable Gravity Product Update
product_update.comment: If product is saved in backend it will be updated in Gravity.

customer_registration.label: Enable Gravity Customer Registration
customer_registration.comment: If customer is registered on frontend it will be added in Gravity.

log.label: Enable Debug
log.comment: Enable debug. In this case all transactions will be logged in /var/gravity.log.
